readable.title: 3127629248_a955b5763b
readable.content: A basketball player is about to make a lay-up . Four basketball players , in front of a crowd . Miami and Clemson playing a basketball game , one player about to lay the ball in The basketball player in white is jumping up to score a point against the orange team . The man in the white jersey is trying to score and his opponent is trying to catch the ball .
